your moms ass is tight and yur an asshole and i dont care what you say or think because youre a faggot.

Video is good, but the audio isn't great. It pops on heavier noises and because of the movie's soundtrack it pops every couple of seconds in most scenes (as if your speakers are blown), if you're not careful the popping might actually blow a speaker. And it's not the volume either, even with the sound almost all the way down, the popping was still there. It's completely unwatchable on VLC, but it's not as bad on Media Player. Just don't turn the sound up too much and be careful with your speakers.  

VLC: V:9 A:-1
WMP: v:9 A: 6
P.S. Thanks for the upload M3nno, just watch your sound levels next time.

V=9
A=9.
no subtitle does not match though.
Thank you for sharing.
Terrible sound. Don't download that release cuz it sucks. The picture is perfect but the sound is distorted.
